# currencyCode

**Instance Property**

The ISO 4217 currency code that applies to the price information.

## Declaration

```swift
var currencyCode: String { get }
```

## Discussion

To retrieve the list of available currency codes, call the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale/isoCurrencyCodes] method of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale] class.

## Getting the Price Range Information

- **minimumPrice**: The minimum price.
- **maximumPrice**: The maximum price.
title: currencyCode
